channel.title: New player rights [317]
channel.description:
I'm trying to add new player rights to my server. Any help?
0 = normal 1 = mod 2 = admin 3 = owner 4 = hidden admin
How can I add 5 = coder 6 = site coder

item.title: New player rights [317]
item.dc:creator: @frostscapeserver frostscapeserver
item.description:
@frostscapeserver wrote:

Yeah but thats the thing. I don’t know what the code is. I’ve searched but. And I think there’s also something client sided because you load a crown? Not sure, I’ll check again.

EDIT: I found this in my client files in client.java

/* mod icons custom */ aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[2] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("modicon1"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[3] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("modicon2"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[15] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("iconh33"); aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1Array1099[16] = new Class30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub1("Bluurricon1");

So I’m gonna look around for the player rights codes. This is the code that tells it what sprite to use.

Read full topic

item.title: New player rights [317]
item.dc:creator: @aurocaido aurocaido
item.description:
@aurocaido wrote:

you would have to go into client.java (if this is 317) and add a completely new right class. Just copy and paste another right class but change name. And copy the one you want it to be like most that should work.

Read full topic
